title: Gold Steadies as Tepid US Jobs Data Fail to Spur Rate-Cut Bets
description: Gold was steady, after sluggish US jobs data on Tuesday didn’t move the needle on expectations for more interest-rate cuts.
content: Gold was steady, after sluggish US jobs data on Tuesday didn’t move the needle on expectations for more interest-rate cuts.
